title: Domestic Package
description: Detailed BIM modeling of domestic water systems including hot and cold water distribution, sanitary ware, and plumbing fixtures. Fully coordinated and clash-free.

title: Drainage Package
description: Comprehensive drainage system modeling including soil stacks, waste pipes, vent pipes, and rainwater downpipes. Includes all fittings and connections.

title: Rainwater Systems
description: Complete rainwater harvesting and drainage modeling including gutters, downspouts, collection systems, and attenuation tanks. Sustainable and efficient design.
